xdsp::lerp Namespace Reference

A collection of linear mappings. More...

Functions

template<typename T >
T map_norm_bipolar (const T in, const T out_lo, const T out_hi)
 Linearly maps a value from [-1.0, 1.0] to a given output range.
(The "lo" bound can be higher than the "hi" bound.)
 
template<typename T >
T map_norm_unipolar (const T in, const T out_lo, const T out_hi)
 Maps a value from [0.0, 1.0] to a given output range.
(The "lo" bound can be higher than the "hi" bound.)

 Linearly maps a value from an input range to an output range.
(The "lo" bounds can be higher than the "hi" bounds.)
 
template<typename T >
T normalize_unipolar (const T in, const T in_lo, const T in_hi)
 Normalizes a given value to [0.0, 1.0].
 
template<typename T >
T normalize_bipolar (const T in, const T in_lo, const T in_hi)
 Normalizes a given value to [-1.0, 1.0].
 
template<typename T >
T to_bipolar (T unipolar)
 Linear map from unipolar to bipolar range.
E.g., [0.0, 1.0] will be mapped to [-1.0, 1.0].
 
template<typename T >
T to_unipolar (T bipolar)
 Linear map from bipolar to unipolar range.
E.g., [-1.0, 1.0] will be mapped to [0.0, 1.0].
 

Detailed Description

A collection of linear mappings.

const T in_lo,
const T in_hi,
const T out_lo,
const T out_hi )
inline

Linearly maps a value from an input range to an output range.
(The "lo" bounds can be higher than the "hi" bounds.)

Template Parameters
TNumeric type
Parameters
inValue to map
in_loLower bound of input range
in_hiUpper bound of input range
out_loLower bound of output range
out_hiUpper bound of output range
Returns
Mapped value

◆ to_bipolar()

template<typename T >
T xdsp::lerp::to_bipolar ( T unipolar)
inline

Linear map from unipolar to bipolar range.
E.g., [0.0, 1.0] will be mapped to [-1.0, 1.0].

Template Parameters
TNumeric type
Parameters
inUnipolar value
Returns

◆ to_unipolar()

template<typename T >
T xdsp::lerp::to_unipolar ( T bipolar)
inline

Linear map from bipolar to unipolar range.
E.g., [-1.0, 1.0] will be mapped to [0.0, 1.0].

Template Parameters

Parameters

Returns
Mapped unipolar value
